titles.title: Home Ownership Protection Act of 2006
A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the amount of gain excluded from the sale of a principal residence.
Home Ownership Protection Act of 2006

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Home Ownership Protection Act of 2006 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase from $250,000 to $350,000 the amount of gain a taxpayer may exclude from gross income from the sale of a principal residence.
